title: Hungry Dino – v0.9
body:

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Hungry.Dino-DARKSiDERS ISO release: ds-hungrydino.iso (3,405,449,216 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 3.2 to 2 GB)
  • Installation takes 1-3 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 3.3 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Have you ever realized that you are ready to eat a horse? Help the little dinosaur to eat with various tasty treats, and do not become a delicacy yourself.

Hungry Dino is a new look on a long-loved game!

Game Features

  • Complete levels in solo mode and take your way to the top of the leaderboards
  • Play with friends in multiplayer mode up to 8 players and find out who is faster of you
  • Meet many maps and monsters on them
  • Run and hide from evil boss, because it is not so easy to defeat him
  • Lost all health? It doesn’t matter, now you are a predator looking for your defenseless prey
  • Eat as many tasty treats as possible; – You can eat monsters that hunt on other players(another color)
  • Eat bonuses, because they can help you move towards to victory
  • Eat all food on the map, take more points and won
  • Power Up – speeds up, also you can eat all monsters and a boss; – Speed Up – gives acceleration
  • Health – returns one lost life
  • Time – Stops monsters of your color
  • Make bites to defenseless dinosaurs
  • All bonuses except Power Up can be absorb
  • Use accelerate to catch up your target
  • Don’t let dinosaurs eat all the food on the map, get more points and win
